JobFullDesc: Creative Experiences (Creative X) is a global, integrated creative agency that drives the creative vision for our brands and how they are perceived in the world. We develop all consumer brand content and experiences for the Facebook company, Facebook app, Instagram, Messenger and WhatsApp. Our vision is fearless creativity that redefines social. With some of the industry’s best talent on our team, we create beautiful work that has a purpose. And with an audience of almost five billion across five of the world’s biggest brands, we create brave ideas that demonstrate the full creative potential of our platforms, including industry leading, envy-inducing creative experiences. We believe in attracting and nurturing world class talent with a focus on diversity, community and career development. We have developed best-in-class collaboration models with agencies and our cross-company creative network. While we lead our team to create innovative films, content, and experiences across our own channels, we also guide our lead agencies in the creation of content for TV, Print and OOH. This ensures a consistent and strong creative narrative for work that reaches an audience across the globe due to the scale of our apps.We are looking for an experienced and strategic leader to oversee Program Management for the Creative X team across Facebook and all of Facebook's products. This is a large, global team working on many of the company's largest priorities. This leader will be responsible for establishing a vision for the team, helping to scale our partnerships with marketing and product, and influencing cross-functionally with a creative business vantage. They will also plan and lead team architecture, oversight of successful campaigns and provide thought leadership in establishing, implementing, and improving creative process across Creative X and Facebook. Our ideal candidate will have experience partnering with product teams, managing multiple large accounts in a global agency or creative and marketing operations experience in-house with a global brand. Our ideal candidate will also be a builder who can frame ambiguous problems and projects into outcomes within a fast-paced environment.Lead with vision in working with Program Management team,
